storeListings.name: Etz Mitzvot
storeListings.description: A visual tree graph of the commandments in the Hebrew Bible. Explore commandments, see their relationship to other commandments, understand the Bible better.
storeListings.shortDescription: A visual tree graph of the commandments in the Hebrew Bible

screenshots.caption: A visual hierarchy of all the commandments in the Hebrew Bible
Tap a commandment to read more about it, see its relationships to other commandments, and read the underlying passage.
Dig into statistics and information about the commandments in the Hebrew Bible.

features: Explore the commandments in the Hebrew Bible
Read the underlying passages of each commandment
Learn about the commandments in a visual way
storeListings.whatsNew: Added commandment 47 regarding consulting mediums and soothsayers.
